org.athrun.android.framework.webview
类 ViewFetcher

java.lang.Object
  org.athrun.android.framework.webview.ViewFetcher

public class ViewFetcher
extends java.lang.Object

Contains view methods. Examples are getViews(), getCurrentTextViews(), getCurrentImageViews().

作者：
xiaoliang.chenxl

方法详细信息

getTopParent

public android.view.View getTopParent(android.view.View view)
Returns the absolute top parent View in for a given View.

参数：
view - the View whose top parent is requested
返回：
the top parent View

getScrollOrListParent

public android.view.View getScrollOrListParent(android.view.View view)
Returns the scroll or list parent view

参数：
view - the view who's parent should be returned
返回：
the parent scroll view, list view or null

getAllViews

public java.util.ArrayList<android.view.View> getAllViews(boolean onlySufficientlyVisible)
Returns views from the shown DecorViews.

参数：
onlySufficientlyVisible - if only sufficiently visible views should be returned
返回：
all the views contained in the DecorViews

getRecentDecorView

public final android.view.View getRecentDecorView(android.view.View[] views)
Returns the most recent DecorView

参数：
views - the views to check
返回：
the most recent DecorView

getViews

public java.util.ArrayList<android.view.View> getViews(android.view.View parent,
                                                       boolean onlySufficientlyVisible)
Extracts all Views located in the currently active Activity, recursively.

参数：
parent - the View whose children should be returned, or null for all
onlySufficientlyVisible - if only sufficiently visible views should be returned
返回：
all Views located in the currently active Activity, never null

isViewSufficientlyShown

public final boolean isViewSufficientlyShown(android.view.View view)
Returns true if the view is sufficiently shown

参数：
view - the view to check
返回：
true if the view is sufficiently shown

getScrollListWindowHeight

public float getScrollListWindowHeight(android.view.View view)
Returns the height of the scroll or list view parent

参数：
view - the view who's parents height should be returned
返回：
the height of the scroll or list view parent

getCurrentViews

public <T extends android.view.View> java.util.ArrayList<T> getCurrentViews(java.lang.Class<T> classToFilterBy)
Returns an ArrayList of Views of the specified Class located in the current Activity.

参数：
classToFilterBy - return all instances of this class, e.g. Button.class or GridView.class
返回：
an ArrayList of Views of the specified Class located in the current Activity

getCurrentViews

public <T extends android.view.View> java.util.ArrayList<T> getCurrentViews(java.lang.Class<T> classToFilterBy,
                                                                            android.view.View parent)
Returns an ArrayList of Views of the specified Class located under the specified parent.

参数：
classToFilterBy - return all instances of this class, e.g. Button.class or GridView.class
parent - the parent View for where to start the traversal
返回：
an ArrayList of Views of the specified Class located under the specified parent

getFreshestView

public final <T extends android.view.View> T getFreshestView(java.util.ArrayList<T> views)
Tries to guess which view is the most likely to be interesting. Returns the most recently drawn view, which presumably will be the one that the user was most recently interacting with.

参数：
views - A list of potentially interesting views, likely a collection of views from a set of types, such as Button, TextView or ScrollView, ListView
index - the index of the view
返回：
most recently drawn view, or null if no views were passed

getWindowDecorViews

public android.view.View[] getWindowDecorViews()
Returns the WindorDecorViews shown on the screen.

返回：
the WindorDecorViews shown on the screen
